(:action remove ;  Remove a component and update the state of the container and its contents
  :parameters (?component - object ?container - object ?content - object)
  :precondition (and (at ?component ?container) (attached ?component ?container))
  :effect (and (not (attached ?component ?container))

(:action screw ;  Attach an object and update its state
  :parameters (?entity - object)
  :precondition (and (removed ?entity))
  :effect (and (attached ?entity) (not (removed ?entity))

(:action fill ; Fill a container with a resource
  :parameters (?container - container ?resource - resource ?source - source)
  :precondition (and (contains ?container) (off ?source))
  :effect (and (filled ?container) (on ?source))

(:action get ; Obtain a resource or update its state
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - entity ?container - container ?location - location)
  :precondition (and 
    (at ?agent ?location) 
    (available ?resource ?location)
    (contains ?container ?resource ?location)
    (not (possesses ?agent ?resource))
  )
  :effect (and 
    (possesses ?agent ?resource)
    (empty ?container ?resource ?location)
  )
